entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with a few flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
